title: Magic's Comments, Simmons' Grievance
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Ohm Youngmisuk and Bobby Marks to talk Magic’s comments about the Lakers, the significance of Ben Simmons filing a grievance against the 76ers, the Nets’ playoff potential and the chances Kawhi comes back.
